AUTHOR: ZeLarpMaster#0818
INSTALL_MSG: Enjoy slowing down your ~~dirty dirty spammers~~ users! Remember that [p]check_slow exists if some people get stuck muted (although it shouldn't happen)
NAME: SlowMode
SHORT: Prevent users from sending messages too fast
DESCRIPTION: Specify how fast people can send messages in any channel. You can also allow them to speak again if they aren't unmuted fast enough.
